name: test_delete_task_by_id
description: Create new task with generated data and delete it by ID, validate status code and that response body is empty

steps.name: Create new task with body: {'name': 'design545'}, expected status code: 200

Create url with base url and endpoint: /list/901510919856/task
Result URL: https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/list/901510919856/task
Send POST request to https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/list/901510919856/task with json={'name': 'design545'} and data=None, expected status code 200
Verify created task with ID: 86c3ff1c2 exists
Fetch task object by ID: 86c3ff1c2, expected status code: 200

Create url with base url and endpoint: /task/86c3ff1c2
Result URL: https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/task/86c3ff1c2
Send GET request to https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/task/86c3ff1c2 with json=None and data=None, expected status code 200
Delete task by ID: 86c3ff1c2, expected status code: 204

Create url with base url and endpoint: /task/86c3ff1c2
Result URL: https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/task/86c3ff1c2
Send DELETE request to https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/task/86c3ff1c2 with json=None and data=None, expected status code 204
